long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Just a fun and bit different way to rate a webpage.

Any one visiting a web page, could choose to rate a webpage using this extension. 

Users could slide the scale in the extension to reflect how they feel in the current webpage/site and share their rating. Rating is saved and visible to anyone using the extension.
